series_name: A Song of Ice and Fire

entity_types.name: Character
entity_types.description: An individual sentient being, human or non-human humanoid (e.g., Giants, Children of the Forest), appearing in the narrative.

entity_types.name: NobleHouse
entity_types.description: A dynasty or family of nobility holding land, titles, or significant political influence.

entity_types.name: Organization
entity_types.description: A formal group, guild, order, or military unit that is not strictly a noble family.

entity_types.name: Location
entity_types.description: A geographical place, ranging from specific structures (castles) to cities and entire regions or continents.

entity_types.name: Creature
entity_types.description: A non-human animal or magical beast significant to the plot.

entity_types.name: Artifact
entity_types.description: An inanimate object of significance, often magical or legendary weapons.

entity_types.name: Event
entity_types.description: A specific occurrence in time, such as a battle, wedding, tourney, or council.

entity_types.name: Religion
entity_types.description: A system of belief or worship followed by cultures or characters.

entity_types.name: Culture
entity_types.description: A distinct social group with shared customs, ethnicity, or heritage.

relationship_types.name: sworn_to
relationship_types.description: Feudal allegiance or oath of loyalty (e.g., a bannerman to a liege lord, or a house to a paramount house).

relationship_types.name: member_of
relationship_types.description: Membership in an organization, house, or order.

relationship_types.name: belongs_to_house
relationship_types.description: Affiliation with a noble family by blood or marriage.

relationship_types.name: seat_of
relationship_types.description: Indicates the primary castle or location ruled by a specific house.

relationship_types.name: killed
relationship_types.description: Indicates one entity causing the death of another.

relationship_types.name: wields
relationship_types.description: Possession and usage of a specific artifact.

relationship_types.name: bonded_with
relationship_types.description: A magical or intense psychological bond between a human and a creature (e.g., Warging, Dragonriding).
